geometr 0.1.0
  • Get Started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

geometries

functions to paramatrise or sketch geometries

gs_point()

Create a point geom

gs_line()

Create a line geom

gs_polygon() gs_triangle() gs_square() gs_rectangle() gs_hexagon()

Create a polygon geom

gs_random()

Create a geom randomly

gs_tiles()

Create a regular tiling geom

gs_voronoi()

Create a voronoi tiling geom

transform spatial classes

functions that transform between geometric/spatial classes

gc_geom(<Spatial>) gc_geom(<sf>) gc_geom(<ppp>)

Transform a spatial object to class geom

gc_grob(<geom>)

Transform a spatial object to a grob

gc_ppp(<geom>)

Transform a spatial object to class ppp

gc_sf(<geom>)

Transform a spatial object to class sf

gc_sp(<geom>)

Transform a spatial object to class sp

getters and setters

methods that standardise dealing with geometric/spatial objects

getCRS(<ANY>) getCRS(<geom>) getCRS(<Spatial>) getCRS(<sf>) getCRS(<ppp>) getCRS(<Raster>)

Get the coordinate reference system of a spatial object.

getExtent(<ANY>) getExtent(<geom>) getExtent(<Spatial>) getExtent(<sf>) getExtent(<ppp>) getExtent(<Raster>) getExtent(<matrix>)

Get the extent (bounding box) of a spatial object.

getHistory(<ANY>) getHistory(<geom>) getHistory(<RasterLayer>) getHistory(<RasterBrick>) getHistory(<RasterStack>)

Get the history of a spatial object.

getSubset(<ANY>) getSubset(<geom>) getSubset(<Spatial>) getSubset(<sf>)

Get the subset of a spatial object.

getTable(<ANY>) getTable(<geom>) getTable(<Spatial>) getTable(<sf>) getTable(<ppp>) getTable(<RasterLayer>) getTable(<RasterBrick>) getTable(<matrix>)

Get the attribute table of a spatial object.

getType(<ANY>) getType(<geom>) getType(<Spatial>) getType(<sf>) getType(<ppp>) getType(<RasterLayer>)

Get the type of a spatial object.

getPoints(<ANY>) getPoints(<geom>) getPoints(<Spatial>) getPoints(<sf>) getPoints(<ppp>)

Get the table of coordinates of a spatial object.

getWindow(<ANY>) getWindow(<geom>) getWindow(<Spatial>) getWindow(<sf>) getWindow(<ppp>) getWindow(<Raster>) getWindow(<matrix>)

Get the reference window of a spatial object.

setCRS(<ANY>) setCRS(<geom>) setCRS(<Spatial>) setCRS(<sf>) setCRS(<Raster>)

Set (or transform) the coordinate reference system of a spatial object.

setHistory(<ANY>) setHistory(<geom>) setHistory(<Raster>)

Set additional entries to the history of an object

setTable(<ANY>) setTable(<geom>) setTable(<Spatial>) setTable(<sf>) setTable(<sfc>) setTable(<ppp>) setTable(<RasterLayer>)

Set the attribute table(s) of a spatial object.

setWindow(<ANY>) setWindow(<geom>) setWindow(<ppp>)

Set the reference window of a spatial object.

utility functions

functions that modify geoms

gt_locate()

Locate (and identify) clicks

gt_rotate()

Rotate geoms

gt_reflect()

Reflect geoms

gt_scale()

Scale geoms

gt_sketch()

Sketch geoms

gt_skew()

Skew geoms

gt_stretch()

Stretch geoms

gt_translate()

Translate geoms

visualise

plot geometric/spatial objects

visualise()

Visualise raster and geom objects

setTheme()

Create a new theme

example data

data that are used throughout the documentation

gtGeoms

Example geom objects

gtPPP

Example ppp object

gtSF

Example sf objects

gtSP

Example Spatial objects

gtRasters

Example RasterStack object
